Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 90th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2017...
Injured on 7/16/2018 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 3 days...
Injured on 7/24/2018 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Traded from Cincinnati to Houston on 3/2/2019 (Going to CIN: P Anthony Aranda. Going to HOU: 2B Manuel Herrera)...
Injured on 4/26/2019 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was claimed off waivers by Seattle on 4/17/2020.
Injured on 6/28/2020 with a Bruised Foot, out for 3 days...
Injured on 6/18/2021 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 4 days...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 3/1/2023 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 5/10/2023 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (C) on 2/8/2024 to a 1-year deal worth $1,300,500 per year...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/4/2024, off Alex Gutierrez (COL)...
